channel.title: Version 5.19 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 5.19.0 (2023-08-12) New New Th' highlight shortcode now accepts th' new parameter title. This displays th' code like a single tab. This be also avail'ble us'n Marrrkdown codefences an' makes it much easier t' write nicer code samples.
